title: Port SKDynamicSurfaceView and SKGestureSurfaceView controls to MAUI
body:
Ports [PR #79](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp.Extended/pull/79) controls from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI, fixing bugs identified during analysis.

## New Controls

- **SKDynamicSurfaceView** - Runtime toggle between hardware (GL) and software (Canvas) rendering
- **SKGestureSurfaceView** - Built-in gesture detection: tap, long-press, pan, pinch, rotate, fling, hover

## Usage

```csharp
<controls:SKGestureSurfaceView 
    PaintSurface="OnPainting"
    TransformDetected="OnTransform"
    FlingDetected="OnFling"
    IsHardwareAccelerated="True" />
```

```csharp
private void OnTransform(object sender, SKTransformDetectedEventArgs e)
{
    // e.Center, e.PreviousCenter, e.ScaleDelta, e.RotationDelta
}
```

## Bug Fixes from Original PR

- Migrated to TemplatedView pattern (was Layout\<View\>)
- Fixed fling velocity calculation: `X*Y` → `X²+Y²` for proper magnitude
- Fixed thread safety: timer callbacks now dispatch to UI thread via `Dispatcher`
- Added null checks for touch event dictionary access
- Fixed ref parameter passing through async boundaries

## Files Added

- `Controls/Gestures/SKDynamicSurfaceView.shared.cs`
- `Controls/Gestures/SKGestureSurfaceView.shared.cs` + helper partials
- Event args: `SKPaintDynamicSurfaceEventArgs`, `SKFlingDetectedEventArgs`, `SKTransformDetectedEventArgs`, etc.
- `.github/copilot-instructions.md` - repo conventions for Copilot
- `.github/workflows/copilot-setup.yml` - .NET/MAUI CI setup
- `docs/PR79-MAUI-PORT-TRACKING.md` - detailed issue analysis

> [!WARNING]
>

> can you look at https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp.Extended/pull/79 and then create a new pr that copies this to maui. This code was mostly working, but i recall there were some issues.
